attributes.action: Ban Scientlogy from ever becoming a religion in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following in the same steps as Germany has done, Scientology should be banned from ever becoming a religion in the UK. It is obvious that scientology is infact a money making cult. Sceintologists should still be allowed to practice what they believe in, however, it should not be given tax exempt status ever as the practices they are involved in do NOT amount to worship.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
